Summary: Teardrop shaped orb hovered for a while then descended into distance
divs: sighting detailsi was looking east toward the mountains during dusk at about 8:05pm and saw a bright, semi-teardrop shaped object\orb. the bottom part of it looked a little brighter than the top portion. at first i thought it was a small trail coming off of an airplane but a few seconds later, i noticed that it was still there. it was pretty high up, just below the clouds and looked much bigger and brighter than a star. it was glowing brighter than a star and certainly stood out. it stayed there for around 15 minutes, then slowly started to descend behind the mountains out of view.
trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were no other sightings in Denver on or around June 2nd 2013
